name: Autobird for Web
description:
This is not your average flappy bird clone! This is our sportsman bird combined with time wasting clicking game! :)

Will you be able to find optimal balance between manually tapping and flapping and upgrading the bird so it can fly all by itself? Gaining high score is tricky, you pay for your upgrades by the Flaps score so choose wisely :).

Do you like this game? Please rate!

Have an idea how to improve it? Let us know at info@playito.com. We are listening and ready to create new updates based on user demand.

Enjoy!

Playito team
